title: Trolling Like a Pro
description: Aaron Summers is twenty-two, on his last semester of college, and approximately one hundred percent through with playing the chump to the never ending quest for love.After getting dumped by his latest almost-boyfriend, Aaron kicks off the start of his senior spring by trolling around the murky depths of Fish Finders, the cheesy college dating site that’s quickly become all the rage. If he’s going to be stuck loveless and alone, he might as well have as much fun with it as he can.Enter Brody Anders, AngryBird88. With such profile highlights like ideal dates that include ‘reading Russian literature about the futility of life. Alone,’ he’s an even bigger troll than Aaron—and about ten times as jaded, too. When Aaron finds out a game changing secret about his newfound partner in crime, will Aaron's perspective on finding love change or will it only make things worse?Follow Aaron as he unwittingly hops on the short bus to self-discovery while learning a little something about the people around him, too.**Warnings for explicit language and sexual content.
author: Melanie Adler
